mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parking_config ( id, total_spaces, fixed_subscription_spaces, updated_at ) VALUES ( 1, #{totalSpaces}, #{fixedSubscriptionSpaces}, NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_spaces = VALUES(total_spaces), fixed_subscription_spaces = VALUES(fixed_subscription_spaces), updated_at = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT total_spaces AS totalSpaces, fixed_subscription_spaces AS fixedSubscriptionSpaces FROM parking_config WHERE id = 1
